sentences.sContent: I have subleased a plot from the farmer.
sentences.sContent_eng: I have subleased a plot from the farmer.
sentences.sCn: 我从农民那里租下了一小块地。

sentences.sContent: The farmer peddled his fruit from house to house.
sentences.sContent_eng: The farmer peddled his fruit from house to house.
sentences.sCn: 那个农民挨家挨户兜售他的水果。

sentences.sContent: As a farmer, you should learn how to yoke the oxen together.
sentences.sContent_eng: As a farmer, you should learn how to yoke the oxen together.
sentences.sCn: 作为农民，你应该学会怎样把一对牛用轭连起来。

trans.tranOther: someone who owns or manages a farm
